SetupDetails.QuestTitle: Example: Eliminate the Oilfield Walker Gears
SetupDetails.QuestDesc: Eliminate the three Walker Gears parket at Mfinda Oilfield.

Precondition.Name: True Only Once
Precondition.Description: Returns true if the boolean variable is true, and sets the variable to false. The variable would need to be reset to true in order to fulfill this precondition again.
Precondition.EventFunctionTemplate: if |[1|BOOLEAN]| then |[1|BOOLEAN]| = false return true end return false

Choice.Name: Boolean Variable
Choice.Description: The custom boolean variable. This will be set to false after the precondition is checked.

Operation.Name: Start Hidden Timer
Operation.Description: Begins a background countdown that sends a Timer -> "Start" and Timer -> "Finish" event. This can be used for chaining events together on a delay, or creating a delayed event loop. The name of the timer is the sender of the event.

Choice.Name: Sender
Choice.Description: The name of the timer. When the timer is finished, an event will occur. You can catch that event By creating a new script with a "Timer" StrCode, "Finish" message, and this value as the "Sender".

Choice.Name: Duration (Seconds)
Choice.Description: The number of seconds that the timer will count to before triggering the "Finish" event.

Precondition.Name: Compare Number Values
Precondition.Description: Compares two numbers. - 'qvars.Equals' returns true when Num1 and Num2 are the same value. - 'qvars.NotEquals' returns true when Num1 and Num2 are not the same value. - 'qvars.LessThan' returns true when Num1 is less than Num2. - 'qvars.GreaterThan' returns true when Num1 is greater than Num2. - 'qvars.LessThanOrEqualTo' returns true when Num1 is less than or equal to Num2. - 'qvars.GreaterThanOrEqualTo' returns true when Num1 is greater than or equal to Num2.

Choice.Name: Num1
Choice.Description: The number on the left-hand side of the comparison.

Choice.Name: Num2
Choice.Description: The number on the right-hand side of the comparison.

Operation.Name: Print Notification
Operation.Description: Prints up to 5 strings and or numbers as an in-game notification.

Choice.Name: Value 1
Choice.Description: 1st Text that will print to notifications

Choice.Name: Value 2
Choice.Description: 2nd Text that will print to notifications

Choice.Name: Value 3
Choice.Description: 3rd Text that will print to notifications

Choice.Name: Value 4
Choice.Description: 4th Text that will print to notifications

Choice.Name: Value 5
Choice.Description: 5th Text that will print to notifications

Operation.Name: Update Table Value
Operation.Description: Sets a value in a table at the specified key/index

Choice.Name: Key
Choice.Description: The key (or index) of the value to be modified.)

Choice.Name: Value
Choice.Description: The new value for the key.

Operation.Name: Play Common Radio Dialogue
Operation.Description: Plays a generic radio voiceover from the TppDefine radio library.

Operation.Name: Add To Number Variable
Operation.Description: Adds a value to a number-variable. Negative values will subtract from the number-variable.

Choice.Name: Variable
Choice.Description: The custom variable that the value will be added to.

Choice.Name: Additional Value
Choice.Description: The number that is added to the variable.

Operation.Name: Start Hidden Timer
Operation.Description: Begins a background countdown that sends a Timer -> "Start" and Timer -> "Finish" event. This can be used for chaining events together on a delay, or creating a delayed event loop. The name of the timer is the sender of the event.

Choice.Name: Sender
Choice.Description: The name of the timer. When the timer is finished, an event will occur. You can catch that event By creating a new script with a "Timer" StrCode, "Finish" message, and this value as the "Sender".

Choice.Name: Duration (Seconds)
Choice.Description: The number of seconds that the timer will count to before triggering the "Finish" event.
